name: Red Line (Video Gamus)
description:
Red Line is a horror game where you attempt to escape an abandoned building while being pursued by a dark presence. Descend to the ground floor to escape, but be wary of what awaits you on the final floor.

Controls:

E - Interact
WASD - Movement
Shift - Sprint
Left Click - Enter First Person

3D modeling by, Tom H, and Jack Ng.
